input.sentences: the family went on vacation to location .
our hosts welcomed us with open arms !
our shack was very cosy and rustic .
that morning we went on a guided tour of the water front .
later that afternoon we went on a raft ride . it was a great way to end the day .
output.sentences: It was the first time I had ever seen palm trees.
We were in a strange land filled with new animals.
We stayed in a building where the porch roof was held up by giant poles.
Our guide took us to popular places that the locals congregated.
We watched men float down the river on rafts.
